modified_SQL_query: UPDATE gap SET EQ(gap.Intercompany_segment, ISNULL(cp.Intercompany_segment, 'LKP_error')) FROM staging.GAP AS gap LEFT JOIN cfg.LKP_Counterparty AS cp ON AND(EQ(cp.Intercompany_Legal_Entity, gap.Intercompany_Legal_Entity), EQ(cp.Intercompany_Counterparty, gap.Intercompany_Counterparty))
